main.name: Xiaojie Li
main.description: I have a passion to create meaningful applications that benefit the people around me
main.bio: Hello! I am a sophomore studying computer science at Boston University. I enjoy creating fullstack applications utilizing technologies such as React, Exprress, Firebase, MongoDB, and more. I'm constantly looking for new opportunities to learn and grow as a developer.

resume.skillmessage: My education and relevant technical experience

work.title: Student Software Engineer
work.description: Student software engineer at a university chapter of Hack4Impact: a company that connects students with nonprofits to develop their technical solutions. I'm utilizing technologies such as Github, React, NextJS, Express, and more to create web and mobile applications for our clients.

work.title: Teacher Assistant
work.description: Co-instructed a cohort of sixteen high school students with full stack web development. The curriculum consisted of HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Python, and the Flask micro web-framework. Provided technical support to students on their projects by teaching them about API, how to create website cookies, and how to use Flask with MongoDB.

work.title: Computer Assistant/IT Technician
work.description: Provided technical troubleshooting to Boston University students, faculty, and affiliates. Assisted in virus removal, hardware repairs, and setting up new computers.

work.title: Fintech Focus Fellow
work.description: I was a pilot class participant from a program sponsored by a consortium of top-tier financial institutions (Bank of America, Goldman Sachs, JPMorgan Chase, Morgan Stanley, and Wells Fargo) to gain a foundational understanding of the FinTech sector and computer science. I learned full-stack web development and collaborated to create a culminating final project that made use of the technologies we learned.

projects.title: Wisdom: Educational Platform
projects.category: Web app that combines Google Classroom with a calendar and grading system

projects.title: Zipshop
projects.category: Basic e-commerce site with Stripe API integration

projects.title: Pretend Campaign Platform
projects.category: a website to promote a pretend student presidential candidate

projects.title: Bash Shell
projects.category: a custom bash shell written in C
